item.description:

HI WHERE WOULD I PUT THIS IS CLIENT.JAVA

if (playerRights < 1) // Items Normal players cannot use { ReplaceItems(1048, 995); ReplaceItems(1040, 995); ReplaceItems(7451, 995); } else if (playerRights <= 1) // Items that Modz or Normal players cannot use { ReplaceItems(1048, 995); ReplaceItems(7451, 995); }[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 12:02:23 PM[/size][hr]well i need to ban some items

can u lot help
